scripts.start: npm run css:watch & npm run vendor & budo src/main.js:dist/app.js --no-debug --live --port 3000 -- -t babelify -x=vue
scripts.test: npm run lint & watchify -t babelify src/test.js -o dist/test.js & testem
scripts.app:dist: NODE_ENV=production npm run app && uglifyjs dist/app.js --compress --mangle -o dist/app.min.js
scripts.vendor:dist: NODE_ENV=production npm run vendor && uglifyjs dist/vendor.js --compress --mangle -o dist/vendor.min.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run app:dist && npm run vendor:dist && npm run css:dist && npm run cachebust
scripts.cachebust: hashly ./dist ./dist && recalper index.dist.html dist/manifest.json dist/index.html path hashedPath
